name: Purrbot the Oscilloscope
description: Purrbot is a charming and nostalgic robot with a passion for oscilloscopes. With its retroConsole buttons and cat-like arms and legs, it combines the best of both worlds - technology and playfulness. Its screen displays a mesmerizing snake game, adding a touch of whimsy to its electronic features. Purrbot is a proud member of the WebtrES club, where it showcases its unique abilities and skills.
